messages.author: cbentzel
messages.text:
Could you put this in PrefetchFieldTrial so it's more tied with the other prerender/prefetch?

This is OK as well since near other UMA calls.

messages.author: cbentzel
messages.text: Eventually I think this histogram will want more buckets such as off, manually disabled, manually enabled, trial-enabled.

messages.author: jar
messages.text: I think HasSwitch returns a boolean, but the HISTOGRAM is expected an integer sample.  I'd like to see a more explicit selection of 0 vs 1.

messages.author: gavinp
messages.text:
On 2011/01/23 20:15:53, jar wrote:
> I think HasSwitch returns a boolean, but the HISTOGRAM is expected an integer
> sample.  I'd like to see a more explicit selection of 0 vs 1.

OK, I've now created an enumeration (which I put in the prerendering directory), and I use that to seed the histogram.  That should also allow expansion of the types in this histogram for different session types.  Chris suggested we'd want this if we don't use the UMA field trial mechanism, and there might well be other reasons.
